body: At 2nd level, a mooncaller gains low-light vision. If she already has low-light vision, she gains darkvision with a range of 30 feet. If she already has darkvision, the range of her darkvision is increased by 30 feet. This ability replaces woodland stride.
name: Night Sight
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Mooncaller/Night Sight
